title: Windows XP ENU master update disc
description:
This is a master update disc for Windows XP (English)
=====================================================

File name: Windows_XP_MUD-enu[MC].iso
File size: 1694826496
MD5      : 0699859d60479ab391d230bb9fd81852
SHA1     : 7947ad2a77e45578e38ddc4191f2c1590116ba8b
SHA256   : 84b1a7f4e13064388f931c23b56bef11729d4cd56906254630341333a94cd8e6


It contains ALL released Microsoft updates for the Windows XP O.S.
Up to and including the latest (and final) updates of March 2014.

Includes:
* Service packs
* Security patches
* .NET frameworks
* DirectX runtimes
* VC++ runtimes
* Silverlight
* Microsoft Security Essentials
* Remote Desktop client update

Includes WSUS Offline Updater installer for easy selection/installation
